Texto: 
severe tenderness; "surgical" abdomen
pain medications; no operative intervention required
axial ct images demonstrate inflammatory stranding in the region of the omentum
omental torsion
• omental torsion
• focal perforation (gastric ulcer, diverticulitis)
• infectious peritonitis
• blood from trauma
7 y.o. boy with generalized abdominal pain
